001package com.technototes.library.subsystem.motor;
002
003import com.technototes.library.hardware.motor.EncodedMotor;
004
005/** Class for encoded motor subsystems
006 * @author Alex Stedman
007 */
008public class EncodedMotorSubsystem extends MotorSubsystem<EncodedMotor<?>> {
009
010    /** Max speed
011     *
012     */
013    public double maxSpeed = 0.5;
014
015    /** Create encoded motor subsystem
016     *
017     * @param motor The motor
018     */
019    public EncodedMotorSubsystem(EncodedMotor<?> motor) {
020        super(motor);
021    }
022
023    /** Set the max speed for the subsystem
024     *
025     * @param speed New max speed
026     * @return this
027     */
028    public EncodedMotorSubsystem setMaxSpeed(double speed) {
029        maxSpeed = speed;
030        return this;
031    }
032
033    /** Set position for subsystem with existing max speed
034     *
035     * @param ticks Motor ticks for position
036     * @return If this is at specified position
037     */
038    public boolean setPosition(double ticks) {
039        return setPosition(ticks, maxSpeed);
040    }
041
042    /** Set position for subsystem
043     *
044     * @param ticks Motor ticks for position
045     * @param speed The max speed to run to the position
046     * @return If this is at specified position
047     */
048    public boolean setPosition(double ticks, double speed) {
049        return getDevice().setPosition(ticks, speed);
050    }
051}
